Directions: In a skillet, cook beef, onion and green pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink; drain. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Transfer to a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Cover and bake at 350 degrees F for 30 minutes or until heated through.
Ingredients: 8 ounces wide egg noodles, cooked and drained
1 (4 ounce) can chopped green chilies, undrained
1 (4 ounce) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained
